title: CONFERENCE: Decoding Cuban Choral Music
details: Workshop on Cuban choral music for conductors and singers. Workshop includes applied rehearsal technique and performance aspects

title: CONFERENCE: Discovering Latin American Choral Music
details: Conference and reading session on Latin American choral repertoire including rehearsal technique and performance aspects

title: FESTIVAL CONFERENCES & WORKSHOPS
details: Various Workshops on vocal/choral technique for intermediate to advance youth choirs. Including adjudication for choral competitions

title: CONFERENCE: Choral technique for amateur choirs
details: Workshops on vocal/choral technique for amateur intermediate to advance choirs. Including foreing language pronunciation, conducting gesture and rehearsal technique

title: CONCERT: Carleton Univerity Choirs Concerts
details: End of year choral concert by the Carleton University Choirs. Further details TBA

title: CONCERT: Coro Vivo Ottawa Concert
details: End of year choral concert by the Coro Vivo Ottawa. Further details TBA.
